document_data.title: When the Lights Went Out in Candlekeep
document_data.story arc: [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''When the Lights Went Out in Candlekeep''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]], [[Anthony Joyce-Rivera]], and [[Carl Sibley]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]].
